title: Sri Lanka’s reserves continue to dwindle
body_lines: Sri Lanka maintains Official Reserve Assets at USD 1,827 million as at the end of April 2022.
Meanwhile the Foreign Currency Reserves were at USD 1,618 million.
This is a significant drop compared to the March reserves assets which were USD 1,917 million and the foreign currency reserves which were at USD 1,702 million at the end of last month.
